doc:
Ralf Harolde https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ralf_Harolde 0 Ralf Harolde (born Ralph Harold Wigger, May 17, 1899 – November 1, 1974) was an American character actor, who often played gangsters. Between 1920 and 1963, he appeared in 99 films, including Jimmy the Gent, Night Nurse, Baby Take a Bow, A Tale of Two Cities, Our Relations, and Murder, My Sweet. Harolde was born in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania and died in Santa Monica, California. Ralf_Harolde ( born Ralph_Harold_Wigger , May_17_,_1899 – November_1_,_1974 ) was an_American_character_actor , who often played gangsters . Harolde was_born in Pittsburgh , Pennsylvania and died in Santa_Monica , California .
